app_description: Welcome to Easy To Read Your Comprehensive Translation Assistant! No matter where you are Easy To Read is here to meet all your translation needs in daily life and communication. Key Features: 1. Text Translation Supports translation of text in multiple languages breaking down language barriers effortlessly. Precise and efficient translation based on industry leading text translation services ensuring accuracy and fluency. 2. Photo Recognition Translation Utilizes advanced OCR Optical Character Recognition technology for text recognition in images. Translate text from photos in real time providing a convenient and quick solution. 3. Daily Spoken Language Summary Records and summarizes everyday spoken language helping you better understand and use languages in practical situations. 4. VPN Connect to a VPN to safeguard your data privacy and enhance your internet speed. Security Assurance: We are committed to protecting your privacy ensuring a secure usage experience. How to Use: Download and install Easy To Read. Select the desired function and start enjoying convenient translation services! Easy To Read makes language no longer a barrier to communication connecting you more closely with the world. Thank you for choosing Easy To Read!
